channel.title: Codebatik by Aditya
channel.description: Recent content on Codebatik by Aditya

item.title: Story of Making Url-Shortener as My Side Project
item.description: A few months ago I was thinking about making a simple service that could help me escalate my skill on nodejs. Basicly the service is pretty simple, it’s called url-shortener. You just generate a short code and linking with the url, it is simple. That time actually I just thinking to make this simple app with expressing my contribution on open-source project, I never build an open-source project based on NodeJs before.

item.title: My Opinion about Rust and Golang
item.description: You know i am really interested with two compiled language which is Rust-lang and Golang from this mid-year of 2017. I think i am are ready to move into more capability which is available on these languages with pretty efficient, fast on managing it’s memory and cpu process. Node.js is cool but instead using a node program to handle some various cpu-intensive or very large memory consumptions around my application. I tend to use a right tool for a right job.

item.title: Pendekin, a shortener url based on Node.js
Pycrawler, a simple python crawler for extracting article content
item.description: Simple library to extract web article content

item.title: Rajaongkir Python Library
item.description: Simple python library to fetching information on rajaongkir.com

item.title: Mungkin Rust akan Menang
item.description: Jika kalian jengah mendengar banyak bahasa pemrograman baru yang muncul baru-baru ini, mungkin kali ini saya akan sedikit bercerita. Adalah tentang bahasa pemrograman yang pernah atau sedang saya amati, salah satunya adalah Rust by Mozilla yang mungkin akan banyak berperan di beberapa sektor terutama sistem programming.

item.title: Berikan Yang Klien Butuhkan Bukan Yang Diinginkan
item.description: Dalam dunia development seringkali kita dijejali dengan berbagai ucapan klien atau kolega yang menginstruksikan kita untuk membuat sesuatu yang bagus, keren dan menggunakan teknologi paling mutakhir seperti dalam pandangan mereka.

item.title: About Me
item.description: A code explorer who loves to write code and seeking for open source artifacts (read: project) through the open internet world. I like to spent my free time to create some applications in order to heal my curiosity on technology, also interested to the content of the leadership, wonder someday i could built a product that help people and found my own startup company. Pretty much loves Javascript and Python, those two language really made my life better again.

item.title: Hackerwatch, a simple hackernews watcher
item.description: Aplikasi web simpel untuk memantau listing terupdate dari news.ycombinator.com atau yang biasa disebut hackernews.

item.title: Library to monitoring your PHP project exceptions
Restful-filter, Simple Node.js (express) library to handle your RESTful query-string
item.description: Simple Node.js (express framework) library to handle restful query-string, it handles filter, orders and pagination based on provided query string

item.title: The Possibilities of Code
item.description: The possibilities of code, dalam kode kita menemukan dunia, membaca berbagai informasi dan juga bertukar ide dan inovasi.
